name: Goblin Run
description:
Welcome To Goblin Run

In this game you will:
1)fight to clear hordes of enemy goblins
2)try not to die
3)have fun! (hopefully :D)

Pretty simple right?

Controls:

use WASD or to move your character around the scene
Space Bar allows you to jump 
use the Mouse to look around
Left Click to fire projectiles at enemies

kill all goblins in a level to proceed
